hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Boomerang#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Prescription#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room
